channel.title: lnmp on IT技术分享
channel.description: Recent content in lnmp on IT技术分享

item.title: Debian_lnmp
item.description: 支持PHP7.2、MySQL5.7 1.nginx apt-get install nginx apt-get install restart 2.mysql apt-get install mysql-server mysql-client mysql -u root -p use mysql; update mysql.user set authentication_string=PASSWORD('gy!'), plugin='mysql_native_password' where user='root'; flush privileges; service mysql restart mysql -u root -p 3.php7.2.5 wget -q https://packages.sury.org/php/apt.gpg -O- | sudo apt-key add - echo "deb https://packages.sury.org/php/ stretch main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/php.list

item.title: Ubuntu16_lnmp
item.description: ########## Install NGINX ############## # Install software-properties-common package to give us add-apt-repository package sudo apt-get install -y software-properties-common # Install latest nginx version from community maintained ppa sudo add-apt-repository ppa:nginx/stable # Update packages after adding ppa sudo apt-get update # Install nginx sudo apt-get install -y nginx # Check status sudo service nginx # Start nginx if it is not already running sudo service nginx start # At this point you should have NGINX up and running, open http://localhost on your # browser and you should see a welcome page from NGINX ######### Install PHP7.
